rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0001
rows.name:
You all heard what Nagi said:
Ganglion forces are closing in on the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'd love it if Chausson could negotiate
our way out of this, but we all know better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0003
rows.name: They've made their feelings about humans pretty clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Our team has been assigned
the most crucial defensive position—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0005
rows.name: the administrative district gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0006
rows.name: If we lose BLADE HQ, that's it. We've lost the war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0007
rows.name:
We have to expect the Ganglion know this,
and will hit it hard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0008
rows.name: Uhhh...yeah, heh. No pressure there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0009
rows.name: Do we know where everyone else is stationed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0010
rows.name: Irina's by the entrance to the industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Doug's on standby until we make
visual contact with the enemy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0012
rows.name: And Lao's guarding the hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0013
rows.name: Tatsu will manage supply lines![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0014
rows.name: Use Nopon connections to keep key materials stocked![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0015
rows.name: Thanks, Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0016
rows.name: When this is all over, I'll bake you into a delicious meal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0017
rows.name: Meh-meh! Tatsu heard you say "into," Linly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0018_m
rows.name: And you, Rook. You ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0018_f
rows.name: And you, Rook. You ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: xs08050100_SEL0011
rows.name: Boast you could take them all on by yourself.

rows.label: xs08050100_JNK0020
rows.name: Shake Your Head

rows.label: xs08050100_SEL0021
rows.name: Confide that you're actually a bit scared.

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Great—just don't get so cocky
you bite off more than you can chew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0020
rows.name: Yeah—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0021
rows.name:
remember, we're a team.
We need to work together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0022
rows.name: To be honest...me too...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0023
rows.name: You'd be a fool not to be scared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0024
rows.name: So Elma is scared, too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0025
rows.name: Of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0026
rows.name:
Bravery isn't about never being afraid.
Bravery is being afraid and moving forward anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0027
rows.name: Let's move out.[ST:wait ]
